creator: tomasz.bech@bull.com.pl
text:
It is usefull in some cases to copy files only when there is difference between
them (especialy some configuration files - jboss, which during build are created
all the time, but the content rarely changes).
So <checksum> as nested element would be great.
Currently I can achieve it by 'foreach copy with condition', but it requires the
ant-contrib usage.
Use a nested <modified> selector inside the <fileset>.
creator: jan@materne.de
stevel@apache.org
text: Or the <different> selector that really does byte-for-byte comparisons
